title: Translating new skills after study
context: Composite of returners who retrained during their break and needed to connect coursework to hybrid roles.
session_flow: Mapped coursework projects to employer language and clarified preferred problem spaces.
Designed networking experiments to test positioning with alumni, peers and hiring managers.
Rehearsed interviews that wove caregiving, study and prior career into one coherent arc.
boundary_and_consent: Coachee chose which personal caregiving moments could appear in stories and could veto any transcript before reuse.
timeframe: 5 sessions across 7 weeks with async feedback on portfolio drafts.
shift: They stopped downplaying previous experience and sounded energised about hybrid roles.
outcome: Landed conversations with organisations open to flexible arrangements and showcased recent credentials confidently.
disclaimer: Composite illustration; results depend on each person's context.
